practice_phrases: I know.
我知道。
I know a few words.
我知道几个词。
I know it's like this.
我知道就是这样。
I know how to say it.
我知道怎么说。
I know what to say next week.
我知道下周说什么。
I know how to do interesting things.
我知道怎么做有趣的事情。
I know how to say a few words to my friends.
我知道怎么对朋友说几个词。
I know how to do interesting things with my friends last week.
我知道上周怎么和朋友做有趣的事情。
Because I think I know, I enjoy doing interesting things.
因为我认为我知道，我喜欢做有趣的事情。
I know how to say what I wanted to say when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我知道怎么说我想说的话。
You know.
你知道。
If you know.
如果你知道。
She doesn't know yet.
她还不知道。
If you know how to say it.
如果你知道怎么说。
He doesn't know what I mean.
他不知道我的意思。
They know how to do interesting things.
他们知道怎么做有趣的事情。
If you know what I mean, it's a good thing.
如果你知道我的意思的话，是件好事。
She doesn't know how to say a few words to her friends.
她不知道怎么对朋友说几个词。
Because I think you know, I'm not trying to finish quickly.
因为我认为你知道，我不是在试着快速完成。
When I didn't sleep well last week, I don't know what to say.
上周当我没睡好的时候，我不知道说什么。
Next week.
下周。
I know next week.
我知道下周。
Next week is interesting.
下周很有趣。
I enjoy next week.
我喜欢下周。
I'm trying to finish next week.
我试着下周完成。
Next week I want to do interesting things.
下周我想做有趣的事情。
I know what to say to my friends next week.
我知道下周对朋友说什么。
Next week I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
下周我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
Because I think next week is a good thing, I don't care.
因为我认为下周是件好事，我不在乎。
I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible next week.
我不是在试着下周尽快完成。

lego: what I need to do next week
practice_phrases: What I need to do next week.
下周我需要做什么。
I know what I need to do next week.
我知道下周我需要做什么。
What I need to do next week is interesting.
下周我需要做什么很有趣。
I enjoy what I need to do next week.
我喜欢下周我需要做什么。
I can remember what I need to do next week.
我能记住下周我需要做什么。
What I need to do next week is a good thing.
下周我需要做什么是件好事。
Because I think what I need to do next week is interesting.
因为我认为下周我需要做什么很有趣。
I'm trying to finish what I need to do next week as quickly as possible.
我试着尽快完成下周我需要做什么。
I know how to say what I need to do next week to my friends.
我知道怎么对朋友说下周我需要做什么。
When I didn't sleep well, I can't remember what I need to do next week.
当我没睡好的时候，我记不住下周我需要做什么。

lego: need to do what / what...need to do
practice_phrases: What do I need to do?
我需要做什么？
I know what I need to do.
我知道我需要做什么。
What I need to do is interesting.
我需要做什么很有趣。
I don't know what I need to do.
我不知道我需要做什么。
What I need to do next week is a good thing.
我下周需要做什么是件好事。
I enjoy what I need to do with my friends.
我喜欢和朋友需要做什么。
Because I think what I need to do is very interesting.
因为我认为我需要做什么很有趣。
I can't remember what I need to do when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我记不住我需要做什么。
I know how to say what I need to do to my friends next week.
我知道下周怎么对朋友说我需要做什么。
I'm not trying to finish what I need to do as quickly as possible.
我不是在试着尽快完成我需要做什么。
Do what?
做什么？
I know what to do.
我知道做什么。
I don't know what to do.
我不知道做什么。
What to do is interesting.
做什么很有趣。
I enjoy what to do next week.
我喜欢下周做什么。
I know what to do with my friends.
我知道和朋友做什么。
Because I think I know what to do, it's a good thing.
因为我认为我知道做什么，是件好事。
I can't remember what to do when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我记不住做什么。
I'm trying to finish what to do next week as quickly as possible.
我试着下周尽快完成做什么。
I know how to say what to do to my friends when I wake up.
我醒来的时候知道怎么对朋友说做什么。
